snippet: Dr. Boyer, an intellectual historian, was known for research on the religious underpinnings of American culture, and especially on how Americans respond to perceived threats.
abstract: Paul S Boyer, historian, dies at age 78.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Boyer, an intellectual historian, was known for research on the religious underpinnings of American culture, and especially on how Americans respond to perceived threats.

headline.seo: Paul S. Boyer, 76, Who Wrote About A-Bomb and Witches, Dies
headline.main: Paul S. Boyer, 76, Dies; Historian Studied A-Bomb and Witches
headline.print_headline: Paul S. Boyer, 78, Historian; Studied A-Bomb and Witches
